knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(Cubist)
```

```{r}
library(mlbench)
data(BostonHousing)

## 1 committee, so just an M5 fit:
mod1 <- cubist(x = BostonHousing[, -14], y = BostonHousing$medv)
mod1
Predict = predict(mod1 , new = BostonHousing[, -14] )
dotplot(mod1, what = "coefs ") # splits
s = summary(mod1)
```
